about_the_game:
WHIMSIDE is a cozy and relaxing collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen, allowing you to explore it at your own pace, whether you're working, studying, or just watching videos. Embark on a journey through enchanting worlds, each filled with unique creatures and hidden secrets. Capture and create new species of Whimlings, then unleash your creativity by decorating your very whimsical space.

DEMO CONTENT

  • Explore the First Biome: Delve into the initial biome, teeming with unique creatures.

  • Capture and Collect Whimlings: Encounter and capture various Whimlings to expand your collection.

  • Breeding System: Combine two Whimlings to create new species and discover unique combinations.

  • Customize Your Space: Decorate your personal area with purchased items, reflecting your style and progress.

  • Achievements and Collection System: Complete objectives and expand your collection to unlock rewards.

The demo concludes upon discovering the second biome, offering a glimpse of future adventures.

Please note that certain features, such as Twitch integration, are not available in this demo.

Additionally, progress made in the demo will not carry over to the full game.

WISHLIST AND JOIN THE ADVENTURE

I am Toadzillart, the solo developer and pixel artist behind WHIMSIDE. If you enjoy this demo, please consider adding the game to your wishlist to support its development. Thank you for being part of this enchanting journey! ♥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Dual-core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Carte compatible DirectX 12 avec 512 Mo VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Optimized to run on basic modern configurations.

short_description: A creature collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen & fits easily into your routine. Whether you're working, studying, or relaxing, Whimside is always ready to offer you cozy pauses. Capture rare creatures, create new species & decorate your whimsical space in this soothing adventure.
